description: Community expectations or requirements are substantially altered, and no longer correspond to business activities.
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Monitor requirements, expectations and knowledge base of user community
- Document and review organisational definition of understandability for each distinct user community In the event of risk’s execution:
- Maintain flexible approach to operational objectives to react to emerging community requirements
name: Community requirements change substantially
notes:
- Have user requirements been subject to change in the past?
- Has the repository or have other external, comparable repositories experienced a change or evolution in the communities using or depositing content?
preMitigationNotes:
- User community adopts new software systems which provide no support for legacy data formats that were previously dominant
- Community becomes increasingly unfamiliar with the semantics of a previously well-known and widely employed scientific markup language
